page.title: 18HANDICRAFTS IN DOLPHINTON
page.content: Handicrafts are now a hobby rather than a necessity, and less time is spent than in former times due to easier travel and t.v. Knitting, hand and machine, is most popular, "Designer" knitwear being very fashionable. Wools used vary from 3ply for baby garments, double knitting for socks and jumpers to "Chucky" for outer garments. Other handicrafts some by women in Dolphinton include:- Silk and woolen embroidery, patchwork, dressmaking, wood and cotton crochet, macrame, rugmaking, soft toymaking, dressing dolls, oil and watercolour painting and drawing, nail and thread pictures, shellcraft, lampshade making, spinning and weaving. Floral art is also popular, using mainly flowers grown locally.
